EmailTemplate.description: Use this template to get missing details from customer to process SPEX order
EmailTemplate.name: SPEX PO - Missing Details
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
To process your exchange order please provide the below missing details:
· PO Number (Buyer) · Sold/Bill to address (Buyer) · Ship to address (Buyer) · Complete end user details (End user Company name and address) · Complete part number(s) with expected price and quantity identified (If unlike exchange, specify the core return part number) · Shipping Carrier (e.g. FedEx, UPS etc) (If not under warranty or contract) · Shipping Method (e.g. Next day, 2nd day) · Customer shipping account number (If not under warranty or contract) · Aircraft Tail Number · Aircraft Make & Model · Aircraft Serial Number · Failed Serial Number · If FOC, Provide a reference to any specific contract (e.g. HAPP, MSP) · Engine Serial number · TSN – Time Since New · CSN – Cycle Since New
To avoid delays in processing your orders, please consider the attached list of requirements for future SPEX orders.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
